info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 3:02PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lewis and Clark and southern Teton Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 301 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Augusta. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Very heavy rainfall is expected with this storm as well. Locations impacted include... Augusta, Bean Lake and Bowmans Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
